actions.name: Quark Drive
actions.description: Effect: If a space within range possesses Electric Terrain, the user is affected by Electric Terrain.

actions.name: Quark Drive
actions.description: Effect: While the user is affected by Electric Terrain, the user's highest Stat, excluding HP, is increased by +30%, or +50% if the stat is SPD. This is before [Stage Change] effects, Afflictions and Items. If the user has an equipped Booster Energy, Quark Drive can be activated for 5 Activations once per combat.
